pageProps.content: ## Overview of Ballerina Swan Lake Update 12 (2201.12.7) Swan Lake Update 12 (2201.12.7) is the seventh patch release of Ballerina 2201.12.0 (Swan Lake Update 12) and it includes a new set of bug fixes developer tooling. ## Update Ballerina Run the command below to update your current Ballerina installation directly to 2201.12.7 by using the [Ballerina Update Tool](/learn/update-tool/). ``` $ bal dist pull 2201.12.7 ``` ## Install Ballerina If you have not installed Ballerina, then, download the [installers](/downloads/#swanlake) to install. ## Language updates ### Bug fixes To view bug fixes, see the [GitHub milestone for Swan Lake Update 12 (2201.12.7)](https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues?q=milestone%3A2201.12.7%20is%3Aclosed).
